item.title: 2020 CTF
item.description: Last update: July 5, 2020 16:24 BSidesTLV 2020 CTF prizes are sponsored by [https://HackTheBox.eu/](HackTheBox.eu) CTF starts in: var countDownDate = new Date("Jun 27, 2020 09:00:00").getTime(); var tick = function() { var now = new Date().getTime(); var distance = countDownDate - now; var days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); var hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60)); var minutes = Math.

item.title: 2019 CTF
item.description: Last update: July 5, 2020 16:24 Hall of Fame 1st Place Dan (dm0n) 2nd Place JCTF 3rd Place EY (3rN357&Y0un9) Honorable mention Adam D JCTF Team YaakovCohen88 Schtrudel Narcissus Moshe Wagner Israel Erlich Dvd848 Our Team Reut Menashe El Profesor (w/Nimrod) The Lost Contract (w/Nimrod) Roei Sherman The Lost Award

item.title: 2018 CTF
item.description: Hall of Fame 1st Place reclass (Nir Lavi and Intelâ€™s team) 2nd Place babyr00t (known also as dm0n) 3rd Place JCTF (@schturdel, @nmontag, @YaakovCohen88 and Israel Erlich) Honorable mention Adam Donenfeld Running a Fair Game This excerpt is from an incident that occured during the CTF. Yesterday, June 9th at 18:26 we discovered that someone has shared the flag for one of our challenges on Pastebin.

item.title: 2016 CTF
item.description: At the 2016 CTF was hosted and sponsored by Cellebrite github: cool story bro if you have any writeups or more information, please let me know!
